mapper.select: select DISTINCT c.* from cinema c,(select s.* from screen s,(select time.* from time where MCODE = #{mcode}) sccode where s.screencode = sccode.SCREENCODE) ccode where c.CINEMACODE = ccode.CINEMACODE
select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no,s.* from screen s where cinemacode = #{cinemacode} limit 6
select count(*) from seat where screencode = #{screencode}
mapper.update: update cinema set cinemaname = #{cinemaName} where cinemacode = #{cinemaCode}
mapper.select: select count(*) from screen where cinemacode = #{cinemacode}
select SEATTAG from seattype where seattype = #{seatType}
mapper.insert: insert into seat values((SELECT SeatCode_nextval('SeatCode') FROM DUAL), #{screenCode}, #{seatType}, #{seatNo})
mapper.select: select (select title from moviedb md where md.mcode = t.mcode) as title, (select runtime from moviedb md where md.mcode = t.mcode) as runtime, t.* from time t where screencode = #{screencode}
mapper.update: update time set moviedate = #{movieDate}, starttime = #{startTime}, endtime = #{endTime} where timecode = #{timeCode}
mapper.insert: insert into time values((select TIME_nextval('select_TIMEcode') from dual), #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{movieDate}, 1, #{screenCode}, #{mcode})
mapper.select: SELECT ms.*,md.RUNTIME FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE ms,moviedb md where ENDDATE > sysdate() and ms.MCODE = md.MCODE
